segments.text: Hi , I'd like two tickets to Providence , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , what time will you like to depart ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What time does the next train leave ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , one just left ten minutes ago . The next one is at two forty-five , debates at five thirty-five .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , could you give me two tickets for that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , that will be thirty-two dollars please .
segments.speaker: S2
